post_text:
I hope everyone enjoys the holiday! We have LOTS of specials going on NOW. Check out what's NEW!

Shop our BLACK FRIDAY category HERE to get lots of items at a special reduced price!!

Also ALL ORDERS PLACED NOW UNTIL MIDNIGHT FRIDAY (11/26/2010) WILL GET $5 OFF!!! USE CODE: hol050

Cyber-shopping is GREAT because it all comes to you, you can shop in your pj's!!
